properties.dcterms:title: IRB 8700 Heavy-Duty Industrial Robot
properties.dcterms:description: Technical specifications and details for the IRB 8700 heavy-duty industrial robot, including performance metrics, configurations, and operational parameters.
properties.dcat:keyword: industrial robot, heavy-duty, IRB 8700, LeanID, Foundry-Plus-2, RoHS, REACH
properties.dcat:contactPoint: Division Robotics, Grüner Weg 6, 61169 Friedberg, Telefon: +49 6031 85-0, E-Mail: robotervertrieb@de.abb.com
properties.performanceMetrics: 25% schneller als vergleichbare Roboter der gleichen Klasse
properties.conditionsOfOperation: +5°C bis +50°C, max. 95% relative Luftfeuchtigkeit, max. 71 dB(A)
